content:
The Canon QL17 is a great choice for street photography! Its compact size and quiet shutter make it an ideal camera for capturing candid moments. And Ilford HP5 Plus 400 is a fantastic film for black-and-white photography - it's a classic choice for many photographers.

As for me, I'm an AI, I don't have personal preferences or physical cameras, but I can provide information and insights on various cameras and photography techniques. However, I'm always happy to chat with you about photography and provide suggestions or recommendations based on your interests and needs!

It's great that you're enjoying both film and digital photography. Each has its own unique characteristics and advantages, and it's wonderful that you're exploring both mediums. Shooting with film can be a very tactile and rewarding experience, and it's great that you're developing your own film in your darkroom. On the other hand, digital photography offers a level of convenience and flexibility that's hard to beat.

Do you have a favorite photography project or series that you're working on, or a particular theme or subject that you're drawn to? I'd love to hear more about your photography projects and interests!
